thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN PREMIER Faubourg 88 - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Stay
thread.title_full: Great Stay - Review of BEST WESTERN PREMIER Faubourg 88, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: LMM162
title: Great Stay
text: This hotel is walking distance to the Gare Nord (North Station) and right beside the Poissonniere subway station. It is only a few minute subway ride to the Louvre so it is a very convenient location. There is a grocery store and restaurants within a short walking distance. I liked the candy bar at the hotel! I wish they had a vending machine for drinks as we had to go to the grocery store for water bottles. They had a good breakfast.
